description: An estimate of the number of aggregation functions that the member who can query can run given epsilon and noise parameters.

parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for one of your memberships for a collaboration. Accepts a membership ID.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Specifies the desired epsilon and noise parameters to preview. differentialPrivacy (dict) --- An array that specifies the epsilon and noise parameters. The epsilon value that you want to preview. Noise added per query is measured in terms of the number of users whose contributions you want to obscure. This value governs the rate at which the privacy budget is depleted.

nested_params.name: differentialPrivacy
nested_params.description: An array that specifies the epsilon and noise parameters.

nested_params.name: epsilon
nested_params.description: The epsilon value that you want to preview.

nested_params.name: usersNoisePerQuery
nested_params.description: Noise added per query is measured in terms of the number of users whose contributions you want to obscure. This value governs the rate at which the privacy budget is depleted.

nested_items.name: privacyImpact
nested_items.description: An estimate of the number of aggregation functions that the member who can query can run given the epsilon and noise parameters. This does not change the privacy budget.

nested_items.name: differentialPrivacy
nested_items.description: An object that lists the number and type of aggregation functions you can perform.

nested_items.name: aggregations
nested_items.description: The number of aggregation functions that you can perform.

nested_items.name: maxCount
nested_items.description: The maximum number of aggregations that the member who can query can run given the epsilon and noise parameters.
